Pre-Game Insights: England have dominated Greece, remaining undefeated in nine previous encounters, winning seven and drawing two.
England are determined to make this match a statement of intent.
Greece will look to challenge England with a disciplined defensive approach.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will be broadcast live in the UK on ITV1, with live streaming available via the ITVX app.
Captain Harry Kane is set to lead the line after overcoming an injury scare while on duty with Bayern Munich.
Dominic Solanke has been called up for the first time in seven years.
Phil Foden, Jude Bellingham, and Kyle Walker are expected to feature.
West Ham’s Dinos Mavropanos and Liverpool’s Kostas Tsimikas likely to start for Greece.
Others: The match is part of the UEFA Nations League B2 group.
